com.inchok.aria2

Class GlobalStat

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.inchok.aria2.GlobalStat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class GlobalStat
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The global statistics of Aria2. To get this stat, use Session.getGlobalStat().
    Version:
    Version 1.0
    Author:
    inCHOK
    See Also:
    Session.getGlobalStat(), Serialized Form
